snippet: The prototype hints at the looks of the coming, third-generation seven-passenger MDX. And for the first time it could be available in front-wheel drive.
abstract: The prototype hints at the looks of the coming, third-generation seven-passenger MDX. And for the first time it could be available in front-wheel drive.

headline.main: An Acura MDX Prototype With Front-Wheel Drive
